data.title: Official Profile on The Marque
data.meta_description: Douglas McMahon is Senior Managing Director of Tavistock Group & Nexus Luxury Collection, specializing in luxury real estate & consumer businesses.
data.text:
Doug McMahon’s Biography

Doug McMahon is co-founder, partner and senior managing director of NEXUS Luxury Collection where he focuses on the company’s luxury real estate and consumer-facing businesses. Tavistock Group is one of the largest investors in NEXUS Luxury Collection.

Along with Christopher Anand, CEO and managing partner of NEXUS Luxury Collection, Doug was part of the original leadership team that designed and built Albany in The Bahamas, considered one of the most successful luxury residential and resort developments.

Doug currently serves as Chief Executive Officer of Wellington Lifestyle Partners, backed by NEXUS, who is planning, designing and will build the new, nearly 400-acre private club community in western Palm Beach County called The Wellington Equestrian & Golf Club.

McMahon was instrumental in leading the turnaround of The St. Regis Atlanta Hotel & Residences and is responsible for the 600-acre golf club community of Isleworth Golf & Country Club in Windermere, Fla. Doug also helped create the highly acclaimed and award-winning Atlas Restaurant in Atlanta.

Doug led the... Doug McMahon is co-founder, partner and senior managing director of NEXUS Luxury Collection where he focuses on the company’s luxury real estate and consumer-facing businesses. Tavistock Group is one of the largest investors in NEXUS Luxury Collection.

Along with Christopher Anand, CEO and managing partner of NEXUS Luxury Collection, Doug was part of the original leadership team that designed and built Albany in The Bahamas, considered one of the most successful luxury residential and resort developments.

Doug currently serves as Chief Executive Officer of Wellington Lifestyle Partners, backed by NEXUS, who is planning, designing and will build the new, nearly 400-acre private club community in western Palm Beach County called The Wellington Equestrian & Golf Club.

McMahon was instrumental in leading the turnaround of The St. Regis Atlanta Hotel & Residences and is responsible for the 600-acre golf club community of Isleworth Golf & Country Club in Windermere, Fla. Doug also helped create the highly acclaimed and award-winning Atlas Restaurant in Atlanta.

Doug led the opening of the private members club of NEXUS Club New York in lower Manhattan and the group’s construction and establishment of the first T-Squared Social bar and restaurant in New York City, in collaboration with NEXUS shareholders Justin Timberlake and Tiger Woods.

Joining Tavistock Group in 2003, Doug played an integral role in the creation and operations of Tavistock Cup from 2004-14 and the revitalization of Lake Nona Golf & Country Club in 2004-08, and served on the FTSE Mitchells & Butlers plc Board of Directors for five years. Previously, he was Chairman and CEO of Publicis and Executive Vice President and General Manager of J. Walter Thompson New York. He was also Chief Marketing Officer at NBC/Universal’s CNBC unit.

Doug currently serves on the US Assure Board of Directors. more less
